product_name: [PROYA] Repair Concentrating Essence Facial Serum 30ml/50ml
description:
Welcome to the official flagship store of PROYA, the only official store directly managed by PROYA. All products are delivered directly from PROYA warehouse in Chinese mainland.
✨Stay young, Stay adventurous ✨PROYA takes cutting-edge technology as its cornerstone and is committed to providing safer and more effective skin solutions, leading the innovation of technological skin aesthetics.
🙆【Benefits】1. Barrier repairing essence to help improve skin tolerance and stability. Focusing on the skin barrier repair of the Dermal Epidermal Junction layer to help maintain a stable skin condition.   2. Healing Essence for people with sensitive skin to achieve skin rejuvenation.Rich in Perlaura and Seadermium, energizing skin’s natural healing power, protecting skin from daily irritants, effectively preventing and improving a variety of occasional acne and comedones. It can be used as a suppliment during a chemical peel.
🌿【Main Ingredients】1. Apply BMs-Tech in skin barrier building with each drop containing a high concentration of Perlaura and Seadermium.  2. Add SK-influx V MB, including ceramide 1, 3, 6,  for cuticle repairing, which contributed to enhancing skin resistance and tolerance.3.Use SymReboot L19 to regulate the balance of the skin’s microenvironment.  4. Bisabolol and olive leaf extract are added for a gentler using experiece when dealing with skin inflammation and soothing the irritation caused by antioxidants.5.Free in alcohol, pigments, hormones, mineral oils, preservatives, surfactants.
🔮【About Ceramide & Skin barrier】Epidermis are consists by skin cells and lipid bilayer, which can be viewed as a protector of our skin.  Normally, lipid bilayer creates a waterproof seal that keeps the bad stuff out and good stuff in. Ceramides is important because this waterproof layer is predominantlyconstituted by ceramides. 
Skin barrier may be weakened as time goes by. As you reach 30, it may lose 40% of its function and this ratio may exceed 60% when you are 40. It turns out that the impaired barrier is part of what triggers complex disorders, such as inflammatory skin conditions and acne. Ceramide is known as a secret to reshape the skin barrier. Low levels of ceramides make the skin rough and dry, especially in the winter, when humidity is low due to the cold air outdoors and the central heating. Moisturizers that are formulated with a combination of ceramides can contribute skin to keep your skin moist for a long time.
📸【More About PROYA】INS: PROYA_official
📢【Q&A】Q1. Can I use it together with other essences?Yes, of course. It can be used alone to stabilize and strengthen the skin barrier and can also be used as a base essence with other functional essences to improve their efficacy.
Q2. When is it suitable to use Repair Concentrating Essence?It can be used as a first-aid repair essence when the skin is sensitive and fragile under the scenarios of seasonal change, irregular resting, skin medical damage, etc. and a base before "medicine" and after "chemical peel" to relieve skin irritation, improve tolerance and accelerate the repair process of skin barrier; it can also be used as a daily essential stabilizing essence.
【Matters Need Attention】●For your first use, please press the pump to the bottom to release the astaxanthin in the specially designed “warehouse” into the concentrated essence outside of it. Then shake the bottle to make them fully integrated. Gently press the pump head, apply an appropriate amount of essence evenly on your face, and gently massage your face until the essence is absorbed.●Customers’ adaptability to the essence vary according to their skin types. It is recommended to try it on the skin behind your ear before you try it on your face. If you feel uncomfortable, please stop using it immediately. ●For external use only. Do not use it when your skin is damaged or in other improper conditions.
【Shopping Notes】 ⏰Delivery time limit: Orders paid before 6 pm every day will be shipped within 3 days. In case of statutory holidays, it will be delayed 1-3 days (the specific delay time is subject to the Shoppe official notice, please contact us for more detailed information).⚠️Return and exchange instructions: You enjoy the 15-day appreciation (hesitation) period of Shoppe from the next day after the goods arrive [Appreciation (hesitation) period is not a trial period]. The returned goods must be in a brand new state with its package intact, without being opened or tried. The shipping costs caused by the sales return are at your own expense. (❗Please inform us through the chat before you apply for a return or exchange of the merchandise❗)🚩Notes: Due to the difference of screen resolution and light, the color of the product pictures on webs and that of the actual products will be slightly different.🔔Customer service: Please feel free to ask for customer service through chat if you have any questions about goods and services.

product_name: BREYLEE Vitamin C Whitening Serum Brighten Skin Face Skin Care
description:
BREYLEE Vitamin c whitening serum brighten skin face skin care fade dark spots freckle 100% natural ingredients anti-aging serum   15ml*1bottle
​

[EFFECTS]

Containing high activity small-molecule Vitamin C, with antioxidant protection, this product can prevent melanin formation. Also with such functions as whitening and brightening the skin color, and removing blemishes and melanin, it can restore skin health, promote skin metabolism and activate damaged skin cells so as to restore elasticity.
 
[INGREDIENTS]
WATER, ALLANTOIN, CITRIC ACID, TRISODIUM EDTA, DISODIUM EDTA, 1.3-BUTYLENE GLYCOL, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, GLYCERIN, DIETHOXYDIGLYCOL, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, HYDROLYZED SCLEROTIUM GUM, LUBRAJEL CG, 3-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID.
 
[DIRECTIONS FOR USE]
After cleansing your face, take 3-5 drops in the palm of your hand and apply it to your face with your fingertips. Massage the product into your neck to ensure absorption. Apply twice a day for day and night.
 
[PRECAUTIONS]
1.In case of sensitive skin, please test the product on the inside of the arm first. Proceed to use it as normal if there is no discomfort.
2.If discomfort arises, please immediately stop using the product and seek the assistance of a dermatologist.
3.If the product splashes into your eyes, flush them with fresh water immediately.
 
[STORAGE]
Keep the product in a cool and dry place out of direct sunlight.
